description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Freshman English** 

Fall 2020

**INSTRUCTOR**  Ann Wan-Hsin Lee 李婉歆 (annlee@ntnu.edu.tw)

**COURSE DESCRIPTION**

This course aims to develop student’s English proficiency regarding all four language skills. Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication competence through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

**REQUIREMENTS & RULES**

1.  You will be asked to work in pairs and in groups. Please be a responsible partner.
2.  Attendance is important. Please show up on time.
3.  A notification of absence form has to be submitted online (學生請假系統). It is also the students’ own responsibility to catch up with the class after their absence.
4.  Please make sure that you have your Moodle account and check both the course site and your email regularly. Not receiving a notice/an email is NOT an excuse for absence or late submission.

**English Song Presentation** **(**50% English, 50% Chinese)

*   (4 people in one group)

Before your presentation, you have to …

1.  find a song you like,
2.  design an activity (fill in the blanks, matching) with a handout (A5, 3 new words, 1 phrase/idiom, 1 pattern),
3.  prepare 2 questions for discuss in class
4.  turn in the handout a week before your presentation.

During the presentation, **_every_** group member has to (1) be on stage, (2) present/explain the song, and (3) answer your classmates’ questions.

**Dubbing** (English Only)

*   (pair work)

Before your performance, you have to…

1.  find an English clip (4-5 minutes),
2.  watch the clip, listen and repeat what is said in the video, and
3.  post the link of the video on Moodle a week before your presentation.

During the presentation, **_both_** of you have to (1) be on stage, (2) play the video with the sound off, and (3) take turns to dub your voice into the video.
